metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5035 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The _dwarf_read_line_table_header function in dwarf_line_table_reader.c inlibdwarf before 20160923 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (out-of-bounds read) via a crafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5035` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20160507+git20160523.9086738-1
libdwarf1 - 20160507+git20160523.9086738-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20160507+git20160523.9086738-1').
